### changeFCMPPredToAArch64CC() {#a6ac70c96c3ec3ca110703f1ebfe5e0ef}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::AArch64GISelUtils::changeFCMPPredToAArch64CC (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst/#a2be3583dac92a031fa1458d4d992c78b">CmpInst::Predicate</a> P, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64cc/#abfa1f7dce576430da99eed57807c7f28">AArch64CC::CondCode</a> &amp; CondCode, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64cc/#abfa1f7dce576430da99eed57807c7f28">AArch64CC::CondCode</a> &amp; CondCode2)</>}>
Find the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64">AArch64</a> condition codes necessary to represent <code>P</code> for a scalar floating point comparison.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">

<ParametersListItem name="[out] CondCode2">is the second condition code if necessary. <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64cc/#abfa1f7dce576430da99eed57807c7f28ab89adee997fb2a645a2d26e1f1bdaadf">AArch64CC::AL</a> otherwise.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

### changeVectorFCMPPredToAArch64CC() {#ab7a7906ef883e6d0a588e63caf3315cf}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::AArch64GISelUtils::changeVectorFCMPPredToAArch64CC (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst/#a2be3583dac92a031fa1458d4d992c78b">CmpInst::Predicate</a> P, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64cc/#abfa1f7dce576430da99eed57807c7f28">AArch64CC::CondCode</a> &amp; CondCode, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64cc/#abfa1f7dce576430da99eed57807c7f28">AArch64CC::CondCode</a> &amp; CondCode2, bool &amp; Invert)</>}>
Find the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64">AArch64</a> condition codes necessary to represent <code>P</code> for a vector floating point comparison.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="[out] CondCode">- The first condition code.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="[out] CondCode2">- The second condition code if necessary. <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64cc/#abfa1f7dce576430da99eed57807c7f28ab89adee997fb2a645a2d26e1f1bdaadf">AArch64CC::AL</a> otherwise.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="[out] Invert">- True if the comparison must be inverted with a NOT.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

### extractPtrauthBlendDiscriminators() {#a1511e75a5fe8384a21552151b86eac3b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::tuple&lt; uint16&#95;t, Register &gt; llvm::AArch64GISelUtils::extractPtrauthBlendDiscriminators (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Disc, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &amp; MRI)</>}>
Analyze a ptrauth discriminator value to try to find the constant integer and address parts, cracking a ptrauth&#95;blend intrinsic if there is one.

<SectionUser title="Returns">
integer/address disc. parts, with NoRegister if no address disc.
</SectionUser>

### getAArch64VectorSplat() {#a1c5d42864ce1e65a6adc088512f68b51}

<MemberDefinition

<SectionUser title="Returns">
A value when <code>MI</code> is a vector splat of a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> or constant. Checks for generic opcodes and AArch64-specific generic opcodes.
</SectionUser>

### tryEmitBZero() {#a9922ec95e157a3432c8ccd4a8a6a2653}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool llvm::AArch64GISelUtils::tryEmitBZero (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; MI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder">MachineIRBuilder</a> &amp; MIRBuilder, bool MinSize)</>}>
Replace a G&#95;MEMSET with a value of 0 with a G&#95;BZERO instruction if it is supported and beneficial to do so.

:::info
This only applies on Darwin.
:::


<SectionUser title="Returns">
true if <code>MI</code> was replaced with a G&#95;BZERO.
</SectionUser>
